Reviews.Title: GOOD SIZE
Reviews.Author: littleme
Reviews.Content: I can shoot a full wedding with this bag! Its  hard to find decent sized bags nowadays, so apart from my big, big, gear case and my little travel bag, I decided to buy this as my midrange camera case. Its made of nice smooth nylon, and its not really a solid color. It has interesting weave. I like the fact that its two toned so the bottom of the case doesnt get dirty. Overall, fits my nikon body, and three lenses :)))))

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Julie S
Reviews.Content: I needed a bag for my new camera, but did not want something that screams "this is a camera"  This bag totally met all wants and needs.  Holds my camera as well as a my extra lenses and accessories.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera bag
Reviews.Author: Rita Prigioni
Reviews.Content: I'll be using this new camera bag for an upcoming trip to Europe. It seems to be the right size for my Canon Rebel T3i and the equipment I'll be taking (one large lens, USB cord, SD disk reader, extra batteries, etc.).

Reviews.Title: Good quality bag, but not as useful as described
Reviews.Author: AlanL
Reviews.Content: The description of the bag states 'Side pockets allow fast access to memory cards, extra batteries, and other small items!!!' NOTE that this bag ONLY HAS ONE SIDE POCKET (not (two) pockets as described) which significantly diminishes its usefulness for me. Other than the fact that side of the bag with the logo has no pocket it is a good looking sturdy little bag.

ProductInfo.Features:
Vangoddy Mythra Reinforced Camcorder / Camera Bag!!!
Fully customizable interior with removable dividers!!!
Padded lens/accessory sleeves and reinforced walls provide superior protection!!!
Side pockets allow fast access to memory cards, extra batteries, and other small items!!!
Convenient carrying with attached handles and removable shoulder strap!!!
ProductInfo.Name: Vangoddy Mythra Blue Medium Entry Level Canon DSLR & SLR Camera Bag For: Canon EOS Rebel T3, T3i, 12.2 MP, 18 MP, Canon EOS Rebel T2i 18 MP CMOS APS-C, Canon EOS Rebel T1i 15.1 MP CMOS, Canon EOS 60D CMOS, Canon EOS 7D CMOS, Canon EOS 5D Mark II (Mark 2) Full Frame CMOS, Canon Rebel XS, Body Only, Or with Lens (Canon EF-S 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 IS Lens, Canon EF 75-300mm f/4-5.6 III Telephoto Zoom Lens, Canon EF 85mm f1.2L II USM Lens, 18-55mm Standard Lens, EF-S 18-135mm IS UD Standard Zoom Lens)
